channel.title: Weapon Box Multiplayer
channel.description: I think you have to put the weapons in the player box for authenticity. From it he takes a weapon, it falls after his death. Also raspodozheie box will not interfere with the module further leap. Here's how it looks like![2016-01-26_00001.jpg|566x500](upload://jyAFCov9S4f5OAzNbEMse0A8qwN.jpeg)

item.title: Weapon Box Multiplayer
item.dc:creator: Cryoshell
item.description:
Johnwalter:

The original model for that case was used in Half Life 1 in Xen, by scientists to store some samples safely.
That red triangle with an “8” is probably a similarity with a real Dangerous Goods sign: Class 8 - Corrosives

After they made Half Life Deathmatch, they used it as a simple ammunition salvage from other players.
And Black Mesa Multiplayer already has that.

I think it wouldn’t fit in singleplayer.My opinion.

But you can use other numbers such as 3 .However model in the screenshot - a model of the Black Mesa Instead of Half-Life.
I picked this model because it is only used in MP

Read full topic
